scenes.title: Website Homepage
scenes.narration: The Cohere homepage introduces you to their enterprise AI solutions. Let's explore the features and benefits they offer.

text_highlights: Your next breakthrough, powered by AI

scenes.title: Product Overview
scenes.narration: Cohere provides a range of AI products. Let's dive into the product page to learn more.

scenes.title: Product Details
scenes.narration: Each product has a detailed overview page. For instance, let's check out the North product for modern workplace productivity.

coverage: This demo showcases the website's homepage, product overview, and individual product details, highlighting key features and benefits of Cohere's enterprise AI solutions.
assumptions: Basic website functionality and navigation are working as expected.
The website content and structure remain unchanged during the demo.
risks: Certain website elements might load slowly or not as expected, impacting the demo flow.
The specific product features and pricing might change, making the demo outdated.

segments.text: Welcome to Cohere's Enterprise AI website. Here you'll discover how AI can power your business. The homepage highlights the benefits of Cohere's solutions with an inviting and informative layout.
It emphasizes security, flexibility, and the cutting-edge technology that Cohere provides. The navigation menu offers easy access to key sections of the site.
Let's explore the products! There's a wide range of AI solutions on offer. Each product is designed to enhance specific aspects of your business.
From the turnkey AI platform to powerful language models, Cohere has you covered. The concise product cards provide a quick overview, and you can dive into each one for more details.
Here's the North product page, showcasing a revolutionary AI platform for the modern workplace. It offers detailed insights into how North can boost productivity.
You'll find an overview of North's capabilities, use cases, and even customer testimonials. This page provides a comprehensive look at the product, making it easy to evaluate.
